definitions.definition: a group of things that are of the same type or that share similar qualities:
examples: We both like the same sort of music.

definitions.definition: the type of thing or person that you like:
examples: Hmm, this is my sort of wine!

definitions.definition: used to show that what you have just said is only an example from a much larger group of things:
examples: They sell souvenirs, postcards, that sort of thing.

definitions.definition: to put a number of things in an order or to separate them into groups:
examples: Paper, plastic, and cans are sorted for recycling.
